description: Confusion and anxiety for Italy's residents as restrictions to combat virus spread take effect.
title: 'People are paranoid' - Life on lockdown in Italy
title_page: 'People are paranoid' - Life on lockdown in Italy - BBC News
maintext: "It seems, to a certain degree, that people are making it up as they go along. For example, you hear from other people that there is a new rule, but you look for it online you can't find it anywhere," he said.
